sentences.sContent: Monitor child's therapeutic and untoward response to medications; monitor the action and side effects of administered medications.
sentences.sContent_eng: Monitor child's therapeutic and untoward response to medications; monitor the action and side effects of administered medications.
sentences.sCn: 监视患儿对药物的治疗反应和不利反应，观察药物的作用及副作用。

sentences.sContent: Any untoward medicaloccurrence in a patient or clinical investigation subject administered apharmaceutical product and which does not necessarily have a causalrelationship with this treatment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any untoward medicaloccurrence in a patient or clinical investigation subject administered apharmaceutical product and which does not necessarily have a causalrelationship with this treatment.
sentences.sCn: 在用药病人或临床研究对象中发生的任何不幸医疗事件，他不一定要与治疗有因果关系。

synos.tran: 不幸的；麻烦的；倔强的；困难的

remMethod.val: un + toward (向…走) → 误入歧途 → 不幸的
